For service to 25 St, Prospect Av, 4 Av-9 St and Union St, take the [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a Coney Island-bound [D] [N] or Bay Ridge-bound [R].

For service from these stations, take the [D] [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].

For service to DeKalb Av, transfer to the [Q] at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

For service from this station, take the [D] [N] [Q] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].

For service to Jay St-MetroTech, Court, Whitehall, Rector, Cortlandt Sts and City Hall, use nearby [4] stations. Transfer between trains at Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr.

For service from these stations, take the [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer to a Forest Hills-bound [R].
